name: Star Wars: Flight of the Falcon
description: In Star Wars: Flight of the Falcon, you get the chance to jump into the cockpit of one of the most popular ships in the Star Wars universe. As the pilot of the Millennium Falcon, as well as other spacecraft, you can relive the battles of Yavin and Endor as TIE fighters and bombers attempt to take you out. On the planet's surface and in outer space, you'll engage enemies through 14 intense missions filled with upgradable weapons and shields.
